segment.source: Rolling out apps with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Rolling out apps with Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Rolling out apps with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Rolling out apps with Microsoft Intune

segment.source: This topic provide specific recommendations for a phased rollout of apps in .
segment.target: This topic provide specific recommendations for a phased rollout of apps in .

segment.source: For general information about rollout phases, see Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment.
segment.target: For general information about rollout phases, see Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment.

segment.source: Phases of app rollout
segment.target: Phases of app rollout

segment.source: The phases of app rollout are:
segment.target: The phases of app rollout are:

segment.source: Project scope
segment.target: Project scope

segment.source: Proof of concept
segment.target: Proof of concept

segment.source: Pilot
segment.target: Pilot

segment.source: Enterprise rollout
segment.target: Enterprise rollout

segment.source: Operations and maintenance
segment.target: Operations and maintenance

segment.source: Project scope
segment.target: Project scope

segment.source: Consider the following:
segment.target: Consider the following:

segment.source: The user task the app meant to enable.
segment.target: The user task the app meant to enable.

segment.source: The suitability of the app for your users and their devices (all operating systems that are likely to be used).
segment.target: The suitability of the app for your users and their devices (all operating systems that are likely to be used).

segment.source: Check that the installer for the app you chose is supported by app distribution, as described in Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: Check that the installer for the app you chose is supported by app distribution, as described in Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: Ensure that app distribution prerequisites are installed, as described in Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: Ensure that app distribution prerequisites are installed, as described in Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: Determine that the app type is supported by .
segment.target: Determine that the app type is supported by .

segment.source: Check that you have sufficient cloud storage space available to upload the app.
segment.target: Check that you have sufficient cloud storage space available to upload the app.

segment.source: Instructions for purchasing additional storage are provided in Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: Instructions for purchasing additional storage are provided in Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: Proof of concept
segment.target: Proof of concept

segment.source: In the Proof of concept phase, test your app deployment in a laboratory environment on devices and users that you've configured strictly for testing purposes.
segment.target: In the Proof of concept phase, test your app deployment in a laboratory environment on devices and users that you've configured strictly for testing purposes.

segment.source: Have your help desk participate in this phase to learn what issues can arise during pilot and production deployment.
segment.target: Have your help desk participate in this phase to learn what issues can arise during pilot and production deployment.

segment.source: Troubleshooting information is available in Troubleshoot app deployment problems in Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: Troubleshooting information is available in Troubleshoot app deployment problems in Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: At this point in the process you should develop communication plans for pilot and production users.
segment.target: At this point in the process you should develop communication plans for pilot and production users.

segment.source: At a minimum the plan should include what app is being deployed, how and when they will obtain it, the business purpose of the deployment, and what to do if they encounter issues, both self-help information and how to contact the help desk.
segment.target: At a minimum the plan should include what app is being deployed, how and when they will obtain it, the business purpose of the deployment, and what to do if they encounter issues, both self-help information and how to contact the help desk.

segment.source: Pilot
segment.target: Pilot

segment.source: During the pilot you will deploy the app to a small group of test users and devices.
segment.target: During the pilot you will deploy the app to a small group of test users and devices.

segment.source: Consider the following:
segment.target: Consider the following:

segment.source: Ensure that the test group is representative of the users and devices that will be using the app after production rollout.
segment.target: Ensure that the test group is representative of the users and devices that will be using the app after production rollout.

segment.source: Educate the help desk regarding the app deployment, and ensure they are prepared to help users in the test group.
segment.target: Educate the help desk regarding the app deployment, and ensure they are prepared to help users in the test group.

segment.source: Choose test users who will subject the app to typical usage and will reliably report issues to the pilot administrators.
segment.target: Choose test users who will subject the app to typical usage and will reliably report issues to the pilot administrators.

segment.source: Activate your pilot user communication plan.
segment.target: Activate your pilot user communication plan.

segment.source: Enterprise rollout
segment.target: Enterprise rollout

segment.source: Use the pilot results to adjust your enterprise rollout.
segment.target: Use the pilot results to adjust your enterprise rollout.

segment.source: Notify your help desk of the app rollout schedule.
segment.target: Notify your help desk of the app rollout schedule.

segment.source: Have mechanisms in place to respond to help requests, and to adjust the rollout as necessary.
segment.target: Have mechanisms in place to respond to help requests, and to adjust the rollout as necessary.

segment.source: Be prepared to troubleshoot the deployment if issues arise.
segment.target: Be prepared to troubleshoot the deployment if issues arise.

segment.source: Activate your production user communication plan.
segment.target: Activate your production user communication plan.

segment.source: Use a phased approach for deploying the app, adding groups incrementally to ensure that the rollout is proceeding smoothly.
segment.target: Use a phased approach for deploying the app, adding groups incrementally to ensure that the rollout is proceeding smoothly.

segment.source: Operations and maintenance
segment.target: Operations and maintenance

segment.source: Operations: Monitor your console for alerts and user or device issues, and to ensure that application distribution is functioning according to your organizational plan.
segment.target: Operations: Monitor your console for alerts and user or device issues, and to ensure that application distribution is functioning according to your organizational plan.

segment.source: Help desk: Ensure that your help desk is aware of any changes to app availability that may result in support requests.
segment.target: Help desk: Ensure that your help desk is aware of any changes to app availability that may result in support requests.

segment.source: See Also
segment.target: See Also

segment.source: Troubleshoot app deployment problems in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Troubleshoot app deployment problems in Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Plan for app deployment in Microsoft Intune
